body: Honestly, I've never seen a rutabaga. I've heard the word, but I've never seen one. I don't know what color they are and I think I spelled it wrong on the website. Can someone handle the rutabaga issue?
title: Fix rutabaga color

body:
The website is so boring and there is no image. Can someone please put one in? We only have room for one image in this article, what should it be? 

This issue may need to be tackled by someone who already knows a bit of HTML.
title: I wish there was an image

body: Some of the vegetables are mis-spelled. This ticket is about identifying which ones are misspelled and then fixing them.
title: Fix vegetable misspellings

body: The paragraph that starts with "This is a pretend article about vegetables" has a lot of errors in it. Can someone please help? Thanks!!!!!!

body:

title: Add a unit to the length on table
